title: [Released] Sone: A simple yet stylish sans serif typeface
content:
Hi Friends,

Just recently I have released a new typeface named **Sone: A simple yet stylish sans serif typeface.**

**It is available for purchase on [MyFonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015024847/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/soneri/sone/)**

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015024847im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sone-type-preview_5112.jpg)
author: akkasone

comments.content: Your W and r are freaking me out!

Nice. Though it looks very similar to what you have used in your website. What typeface is that?

And I am from Ahmedabad too, btw.
Yes, I find the W and w a bit freaky too! Otherwise it's quite stylish. The banners are nicely designed too.
friends, thanks for your comment. If there is a prob with 'W' then i will add an alternate character to it for that. Hope that will work out.
